Straight Shot now brings Elita into the room with Rodimus, knowing now is a=
 good time to let him know that she's all right.

" Elita is okay, Nightlig=
ht is being repaired but I believe she'll make a full recovery or at least =
I have a feeling she will. Oh, um by the way, maybe you should thank Tucson=
 for helping you.  After all, he took a real gamble in going back into that=
 tunnel to find you."

Rat Trap nodds.

"Yeah, it was a real bumpy ride too=
.  He couldn't let ya sit there and get destroyed, he risked his spark ta s=
ave ya, and I'm glad we got ya back."

Tucson directs an ear toward Rodimus=
.

"Don't worry, no one is going to go after you, as long as my spark remai=
ns strong.  Rodimus, we've been through a great ordeal, but I promise you t=
hat no harm to you will go un noticed.  That hive has caused nothing but st=
rife for all of us, and I will not tolerate that happening again.  So here =
is where we stand..  We have two enemies to vanquish.  Yet in order to stop=
 one, we must stop the other.  We need to know everything there is about th=
ose insectoids, and find out their weaknesses, and subdue them.  Then, we w=
ill deal with what comes afterwards.  I can only hope that all of us, inclu=
ding Windlord, will be able to turn the tables which desperately need turni=
ng."

Night Shift steps forward.

"I'm in."

Rat Trap raises his hand.

"Co=
unt me in."

Quickstride nodds.

"Always here ta help."

Straight Shot salu=
tes.

"Ready ta rumble."

Tucson now puts a hand on Rodimus's shoulder.

"S=
o, when you are fully rested, will you do me the honor of rolling out along=
 side me?"

ta???"
